resources.string: üå† Unleash the wonders of the universe with the NASA Image of the Day Generator app! Immerse yourself in a stellar collection of daily images, saved memories, and real-time tracking of the International Space Station. Your window to the cosmos has never been more captivating. Explore, save, and marvel at the beauty of space!

üöÄ Welcome to the Nasa Image of the Day home screen! Explore the cosmos by either gazing at today\'s celestial wonders, picking a specific date to unlock the universe\'s past, enjoying your curated collection, or tracking the International Space Station in real-time. Your cosmic journey begins here!

‚ú® Wow, behold this captivating photo from the cosmos! Capture its beauty forever by saving it to your collections (tap the save icon). Dive deeper into the mysteries behind the image by tapping the text for a detailed description. Every snapshot has a story; unfold it!

üåå Your celestial haven for NASA\'s finest images! Tap an image to unveil its secrets, rename it to make it uniquely yours, or bid it farewell by removing it from your cosmic collection. Your personal gallery of wonders awaits exploration.

üõ∞Ô∏è Track the International Space Station in real-time! Witness its celestial journey with updates every 10 seconds, revealing its path, altitude, velocity, and visibility levels. Press the tracking button for an interstellar experience; once tracking, press again to pause the cosmic updates.
Space Image of the Day Generator v.1
